resource.description: Profile for a single customer account

attribute.name: trading-limit
attribute.comment: Amount available for transactions expressed in the base currency.

attribute.name: trading-limit-utilised
attribute.comment: Amount of trading limit currently used.
Always a positive number, zero if absent.

relationship.name: beneficiaries
relationship.comment: Beneficiary bank accounts to which currency may delivered on behalf of the customer.

relationship.name: remittable-currencies
relationship.comment: Currencies which may be accepted from the customer.

relationship.name: deliverable-currencies
relationship.comment: Currencies which may be delivered on behalf of the customer.

relationship.name: deliverable-countries
relationship.comment: Countries to which currency may be delivered on behalf of the customer.

relationship.name: payment-reasons
relationship.comment: The set of possible resonas that this account may give when requesting a payment to a beneficiary.
